name: Maze of Codes
description:
Use the direction controls to navigate the car through the maze.
Your goal is to locate and align the hidden QR code pieces

hints.name: Inverted Vision
hints.text: Not everything is as it seems—when things look upside down, perhaps your progress is right side up.

hints.name: Twisted Controls
hints.text: Sometimes you must go left… by pressing right

hints.name: Solution
hints.text:
You pushed the three boxes into position, successfully aligning the halves of each QR code.
Once combined, each QR code was scanned to progress through the puzzle.
